creator: Four Souls Stats
descriptionHtml:
This app allows you to store your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls, and allows play groups to sync up their games so all members can access their played games.

The app will also automatically calculate the win rates and average souls for both your playgroup and the wider community, allowing for more general discussion of the "most powerful" characters, and settle any debates about the "best player" in the group.
descriptionShort: An app for storing your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
First release with main data entry functions, and a basic statistics page

V 1.01
Changed random string generation to include letters as well as numbers so there should never be an issue

Fixed the database so it actually syncs across devices properly

V 1.02
Removed the CWC Broken alternate art card since it will no longer be in the game

title: Four Souls Statistics

creator: Four Souls Stats
descriptionHtml:
This app allows you to store your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls, and allows play groups to sync up their games so all members can access their played games.

descriptionShort: An app for storing your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
First release with main data entry functions, and a basic statistics page

V 1.01
Changed random string generation to include letters as well as numbers so there should never be an issue

Fixed the database so it actually syncs across devices properly

V 1.02
Removed the CWC Broken alternate art card since it will no longer be in the game

V 1.03

Added support for custom items and characters with text input - image addition to follow

title: Four Souls Statistics

creator: Four Souls Stats
descriptionHtml:
This app allows you to store your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls, and allows play groups to sync up their games so all members can access their played games. You can choose which editions of the game you want to play with, as well as adding your own custom characters and treasures to best match your play group.

The app will also automatically calculate the win rates and average souls for both your playgroup and the wider community, allowing for more general discussion of the "most powerful" characters, and settle any debates about the "best player" in the group. You can record the games you play, and see up to date statistics for different players in your group. If you make a mistake, you can edit and remove the games from your record.
descriptionShort: An app for storing your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 2.0:

Added the ability to add an image for your custom characters

Added all alt art and promo card art for eden, and made them appear based on selected editions

Added ability to edit and remove games

Changed button art, and got rid of purple because it didn't really fit

Changed switch art

Going offline no longer hides the group id input

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 2.0:

Added the ability to add an image for your custom characters

Added ability to edit and remove games

Going offline no longer hides the group id input

Version 2.01:

Added a new font for legibility (Atkinson Hyperlegible)

Changed group ids to no longer include O, so there is no longer confusion between O and 0

Added a tutorial entry for editing games

descriptionShort: An app for storing your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 2.03:

Added ability to reset the tutorial and clear any stored data on the device

Made the settings page scrollable

Version 2.04:

Added support for statistics filtering for both number of players and number of characters

Added the ability to feedback using other methods that GitHub

Added new sections for community metrics for character and eternal item, which are also filterable

title: Four Souls Statistics

creator: Four Souls Stats
descriptionHtml:
This app allows you to store your data when playing The Binding Of Isaac: Four Souls, and allows play groups to sync up their games so all members can access their played games. You can choose which editions of the game you want to play with, as well as adding your own custom characters and treasures to best match your play group.

The app will also automatically calculate the win rates and average souls for both your playgroup and the wider community, allowing for more general discussion of the "most powerful" characters, and settle any debates about the "best player" in the group. You can record the games you play, and see up to date statistics for different players in your group. If you make a mistake, you can edit and remove the games from your record.

This app also collates the community data stored in its servers to give an indication of the strongest characters as an overall community.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 2.03:

Added ability to reset the tutorial and clear any stored data on the device

Version 2.04:

Added support for statistics filtering, and access to community statistics

Added the ability to feedback by email

Version 3.0:

Added in the new requiem art for all the characters

Fixed some minor networking issues that were causing the app to freeze

Removed invalid eternal items for Eden, and added requiem treasures

Other minor change for usability

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed a bug in the tutorial where the button to advance was off screen
Forced the tutorial to move forward automatically after 10 seconds to prevent people getting stuck on it
Added the new promo Bum-bo character art to the app
Fixed a bug where patch notes would overlap the title on smaller devices
Added a Spanish app translation using Google translate - please let me kow if this is unreadable

title:
Four Souls Statistics
5.03
